summary: Here's how crypto mining companies performed on Tuesday, Dec. 20.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Stocks mixed as bitcoin rallies
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block showed mixed results Tuesday, with about half trading up and the other half down.
Bitcoin was up and trading a bit under $16,900 by market close, according to data from TradingView.
BTCUSD Chart by TradingView
